page.title: 04CHANGES IN WILMSLOW
page.content: We interviewed two people, Mrs. Gefferay about{1965}and Mrs. May about {1945. They both talked about the {central part of Wilmslow as well as {about S.W.Wilmslow. There used to be two cinemas,one under the bridge by the station and The Rex which is still open in Wilmslow. Mrs May and Mrs Gefferay said that these days there is nothing for teenagers to do. More people used to go to church. There were not very many cars,Mrs May and Mrs Gefferay always went to Wilmslow by bus. There were not many shops, there were just small shops but in 1965 the first big super_market was opened in central Wilmslow. They both preferred Wilmslow in the past.
